subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Undies in a Bundy!

Rhonda,
 
I have explained why, and have even posted a comparison file to =
bolster my explanation.
Sceptics are closed minded individuals that will ne=
ver concede to any kind of paranormal proof
no matter how it is presented, =
in my original post I stated that I was beyond considering proving this com=
munication.
One would only have to turn on a box in someones presence to do=
 that. The important thing to me now
Is the messages that are being receive=
d and understanding their meaning. If that takes me cutting out a few blips=
 and blahs
from a file in order to hear the message without interruption, s=
o be it. Hard line sceptics in my book are the bottom feeders of 
the paran=
ormal world, because they are incompetenet when it comes to gathering valid=
 data or they are frightened by the 
chance of proving something that they =
are afraid really does exist or for whatever reason. in my ten years of exp=
erience in dealing with them
I have never run into one that's mind could be=
 changed, even if it was a manifested spirit themselves trying to change it=
.
 
So to me Sceptics and debunkers be damned!
 
I clip the garbage from my=
 files and so do some of the other more experienced 
researchers here. By y=
our statement in this post you are saying that I am a dishonest researcher =
and the files I present are doctored or fraudulent.
 
"did it occur to me t=
hat others on here would either....
but ur right there are people out there=
 who are dishonest 
and would do that without blinkin an eye...."
 
 
 
Jul=
i was very hasty in writing that post and It was actually directed at a sin=
gle individual, it should never have been written without forethought of th=
e ramifications it would insinuate.
She has attempted to amend her position=
 in a short post following the one she wrote mentioning my name and Steve's=
 name, omitting us from her comments. But I guess that did not work evident=
ly, Like I told her most readers of the post would take the wrong meaning.
=
 
At this point in my research I do not feel the need to prove anything to =
anyone, and like I said all raw versions of my files will be made available=
 upon request by respected critics in this field.
 
Bruce
 
 
Bruce Hallida=
y 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: rhondak1973@...: Fri, 18 Ap=
r 2008 20:55:49 -0700Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Undies in a Bundy!





I under=
stand now what ya'll are saying...it never occurred to me to edit my stuff =
to make it sound good nor did it occur to me that others on here would eith=
er....but ur right there are people out there who are dishonest and would d=
o that without blinkin an eye....which is sad and would make it hard on our=
 parts to prove to skeptics that we arent BSing them.  Im gonna stop cuttin=
 out the garbage in my files....I was doing it mainly to save us some space=
 on the forum cuz I dont want us to run out and have to delete stuff. (woul=
d prolly help if everyone posted mp3s tho instead of wav files even if they=
 are short they are still bigger than the mp3)
 
Rhonda
Jules <ghostchasing=
fool@...> wrote:


Holy Cow, I leave for my daughters school event at=
 3:30 and I have too much email on this subject!First and foremost I was di=
recting those who are in fact are paranormal investigators, in field resear=
ch. Many here are not! I was in no way implying that Bruce, Steve, etc. wer=
e fabricating their audio clips in any way!!!! I HIGH RESPECT BRUCE, STEVE =
AND THE the other on this board! I am speaking from my experiences, and bei=
ng in the line of fire throughout the years regarding cutting and pasting c=
lips together.I don't care what you do to be completely honest, I just know=
 that given the drama and know how nasty people can be, I will not cut and =
paste which is my preference. Just because someone who does, given their re=
putation (such as Bruce's) I certainly would have no reason to question the=
 authenticity of his work. However, there are those who I do question, such=
 as the post of Mr.Roundtrees photo's (posted the previous day) and given t=
he manufacturing of those so called ghost photo's I would serious NEVER tak=
e any audio he produced as creditable. This is the point I was trying to ma=
ke. I will also tell you that a year ago upon listening to some of the file=
s here, the first thing I noticed was that when I played certain files I co=
uld clearly see with the editing software that they were not raw audio. I i=
mmediately formed an opinion that they in fact could be bogus! That was my =
initial impression. It wasn't until I formed a personal friendship with som=
e of them that I know THEY WOULD NEVER comprise their integrity and that th=
is specific research was extremely important to them. I will be the first t=
o admit that I was very wrong, but I did base my judgment given what I saw.=
 Other may just do the same.The average person who happens upon this search=
 who in fact has been subject to those who do not stand behind their resear=
ch will not know better. They too may just form the same opinion based on w=
hat they have come across in this industry. Many I have had the pleasure of=
 talking to outside this board, and I will tell you that it is an honor to =
be among good honest creditable people, who truly do care! I know NONE OF Y=
OU whom I have spoken with would EVER do this, but unfortunately there are =
those who will.I hope this clears things up, and people are not going to ma=
ke a mountain out of a mole hill.Juli
